::DarkMouse::

The info he extracted showed that she had not been with Megatron's 
group for some time.  It showed her fighting with Aracnia's group.  
Then he saw her when she dies and was broght back from the matrix.  
he saw how the energon in her mech fluid made her heal from her 
wounds at a super fast rate.  He saw her when she fled Aracnia's 
group and when she was in the forest for a while.  He saw how inferno 
just flew up to her and told her how Megatron was dead and then the 
attack on her and inferno.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor nodded "I see but I have a much easier way. I can scan 
her 
> datatracks and try and find out if she does know." His eyes turned 
green and 
> a clear light flew from his eyes at darkmouses...soon he would know 
the truth.
